"use client" import { useEffect, useState } from "react" import { Link } from "react-router-dom" import axios from "axios" import "bootstrap/dist/css/bootstrap.min.css" const HomePage = () => { const [books, setBooks] = useState([]) const [search, setSearch] = useState("") const [selectedCategory, setSelectedCategory] = useState("") useEffect(() => { axios .get("http://localhost:9999/books") .then((res) => setBooks(res.data)) .catch((error) => console.error("Error fetching books:", error)) }, []) // Filter books by search and category const filteredBooks = books.filter( (book) => book.title.toLowerCase().includes(search.toLowerCase()) && (selectedCategory === "" || book.category.name === selectedCategory), ) // Get list of categories for filtering const categories = [...new Set(books.map((book) => book.category.name))] return (
{/* Header Section */}

Book Library

Discover and manage your book collection

{/* Category Filter Section */}
Filter by Category
{categories.map((category) => (
setSelectedCategory(e.target.value)} />
))}
{/* Book List Section */}

Book Collection

{/* Search and Add Book Section */}
setSearch(e.target.value)} /> {search && ( )}
Add New Book
{/* Books Table */}
{filteredBooks.length > 0 ? ( filteredBooks.map((book) => ( )) ) : ( )}
Title Author Category Description Stock Available
{book.title} {book.author?.name} {book.category?.name} {book.description.length > 50 ? `${book.description.substring(0, 50)}...` : book.description} {book.stock} {book.available ? ( Available ) : ( Unavailable )}
No books found matching your criteria
{/* Results Summary */}
Showing {filteredBooks.length} of {books.length} books {selectedCategory && Filtered by: {selectedCategory}}
) } export default HomePage
